Halwara (; ISO: Halawāṛā) is a township in Punjab state in India in the Ludhiana. It is the location of Halwara Air Force Base.

* [https://www.globalsecurity.org/military/world/india/halwara.htm Halwara Air Base - globalsecurity.org]
